DOC.brief_summary: The propose study aim investigate consumption grape seed extract ( GSE ) would improve antioxidant status impaired insulin action follow consumption pro-oxidative high carbohydrate , high fat ( HCHF ) meal healthy human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Grape Seed Extract Insulin Sensitivity Oxidative Stress Inflammation Markers .
DOC.detailed_description: This study single-center , double blind , placebo-controlled , randomize , 2-arm , 2-sequence , crossover study A planned sample size 15 recruit study . This study require one initial screening , one pre-study visit , two 6-hour study visit . The study take 2-5 week per subject complete . The initial screening visit provide subject Institutional Review Board approve consent document determine subject eligibility BMI calculate height weight measurement , vital sign , fast blood glucose test ( finger prick ) , lipid profile ( 3 ml blood sample via butterfly needle device ) completion questionnaire relate general eating , health , exercise habit . If subject willing eligible participate , 3-day food record ( 2 weekday 1 weekend day ) instruct initial screen visit collect pre-study visit ass subject ' usual dietary intake pattern . After review food record , subject instruct avoid grape , grape product , berry , berry product throughout study strictly follow limited polyphenolic diet 3 day prior 6-hr study visit , maintain usual diet pattern physical activity . Prior study visit , subject advise similar dinner meal control second meal effect food beverage intake night study visit . Subjects arrive center ~10 hour overnight fasting , well hydrate rest . Each study visit require blood draw throughout visit . After pre-study procedure ( height , weight , waist circumference , vital sign , fast blood glucose test ) , register nurse place catheter subject 's arm purpose multiple blood sample collection collect fast blood sample . During study visit , subject take one two capsule right fast blood draw ) , base randomization sequence ( either 1 grape seed extract capsule 1 placebo capsule ) . One hour administration assign capsule , blood sample collect . And standard high carbohydrate high fat breakfast meal serve subject blood draw designate time 5 hour .
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 65 year old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) range 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 ; exception BMI 18.5 23 kg/m2 Asian population Fasting blood glucose concentration < 110 mg/dL Fasting LDLcholesterol < 180 mg/dL Fasting Total cholesterol Fasting Triglycerides < 250 mg/dL Weight stable : gain lose weight +/ 5 lb previous 3 month Nonsmokers No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal hepatic disease Not take medication dietary supplement would interfere outcomes study , i.e . lipid lower medication , antiinflammatory drug , fish oil , probiotic , grape seed supplement , etc…If antiinflammation and/or antibiotic medications/supplements take , subject may qualify go medications/supplements 30 day washout enter study . Able provide inform consent Able comply perform procedure request protocol Past smoker : abstinence le 2 year Men woman smoke Men woman know suspected food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity study material closely related compound state ingredient . Men woman know have/diagnosed diabetes mellitus Men woman fast blood glucose concentration ≥110 mg/dL Men woman uncontrolled blood pressure > 140 mmHg/90 mmHg Men woman document vascular disease , e.g. , heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke , angina , related surgery . Men woman cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer previous 5 year . Men woman take medication dietary supplement may interfere outcome study ; e.g. , antioxidant supplement , antiinflammation , lipid lower medication . Subjects may choose go dietary supplement ( require 30 day washout ) . Men woman take blood pressure lower medication may interfere outcome study ; e.g . diuretic . Men woman donate blood within 3 month screen visit blood donors/participants participation study result donate 1500 milliliter blood previous 12 month . Men woman vegetarian vegan Substance ( alcohol drug ) abuse within last 2 year . Excessive coffee tea consumer ( > 4 cups/day ) Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete Unstable weight : gain lose weight +/ 5 lb previous 3 month Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study Women lactate
